clusterList.phrase: if it was any other guru he will parade a banner saying mahavira's chief lay-disciple has become my follower but you venerable sir you asked me to go home and reconsider now i want to be your follower even more i will not stand up until you accept me
upali as a jain you have always given alms to jain monks when you become my follower you will continue to give alms to jain monks this is my condition
